hibernate-mapping.sql-query: SELECT LENDING_TYPE_ID, DESCRIPTION, LENDING_TYPE, ORG_CATEGORY, ACCOUNT_CODE, GST_PERCENTAGE, TO_CHAR(INSERT_DATE, 'yyyymmddhh24miss') AS INSERT_DATE, INSERT_USER_ID, IS_APPLY_GST, PARENT_LENDING_TYPE, SORT_ORDER, TO_CHAR(UPDATE_DATE, 'yyyymmddhh24miss') AS UPDATE_DATE, UPDATE_USER_ID FROM SYS_LENDING_TYPE WHERE 1 = 1 ${auto_fill} ${frameworkGeneratedWhere} ${frameworkGeneratedOrderBy}

INSERT INTO SYS_LENDING_TYPE ( LENDING_TYPE_ID, DESCRIPTION, LENDING_TYPE, ORG_CATEGORY, ACCOUNT_CODE, GST_PERCENTAGE, INSERT_DATE, INSERT_USER_ID, IS_APPLY_GST, PARENT_LENDING_TYPE, SORT_ORDER, UPDATE_DATE, UPDATE_USER_ID ) VALUES ( ${LENDING_TYPE_ID}, ${DESCRIPTION}, ${LENDING_TYPE}, ${ORG_CATEGORY}, ${ACCOUNT_CODE}, ${GST_PERCENTAGE}, ${INSERT_DATE}, ${INSERT_USER_ID}, ${IS_APPLY_GST}, ${PARENT_LENDING_TYPE}, ${SORT_ORDER}, ${UPDATE_DATE}, ${UPDATE_USER_ID} )

UPDATE SYS_LENDING_TYPE SET DESCRIPTION = ${DESCRIPTION}, LENDING_TYPE = ${LENDING_TYPE}, ORG_CATEGORY = ${ORG_CATEGORY}, ACCOUNT_CODE = ${ACCOUNT_CODE}, GST_PERCENTAGE = ${GST_PERCENTAGE}, INSERT_DATE = ${INSERT_DATE}, INSERT_USER_ID = ${INSERT_USER_ID}, IS_APPLY_GST = ${IS_APPLY_GST}, PARENT_LENDING_TYPE = ${PARENT_LENDING_TYPE}, SORT_ORDER = ${SORT_ORDER}, UPDATE_DATE = ${UPDATE_DATE}, UPDATE_USER_ID = ${UPDATE_USER_ID} WHERE 1 = 1 ${frameworkGeneratedWhere}
